references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach to modeling irregularly sampled time series using neural ordinary differential equations, which is a key method addressed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Latent ordinary differential equations for irregularly-sampled time series
references.reason: This paper extends the work on neural ODEs to handle irregularly sampled time series data, which is directly relevant to the current paper's focus on irregularly sampled medical time series.

references.paper_title: Multi-time attention networks for irregularly sampled time series
references.reason: This paper introduces a multi-time attention network designed to capture temporal dependencies in irregularly sampled time series, which is a relevant technique for handling the unique temporal patterns of medical time series data.

references.paper_title: Graph-guided network for irregularly sampled multivariate time series
references.reason: This paper leverages graph neural networks to model inter-variable dependencies in irregularly sampled multivariate time series, directly addressing a key challenge in analyzing medical time series data.

references.paper_title: Recurrent neural networks for multivariate time series with missing values
references.reason: This paper proposes recurrent neural network architectures designed to effectively handle missing values in multivariate time series data, which is a crucial consideration when dealing with real-world medical time series.
